abstract: AT&T sent out text messages to 75 million customers -- urging subscribers to tune into the season premier of “American Idol.”
snippet: AT&T sent out text messages to 75 million customers -- urging subscribers to tune into the season premier of “American Idol.”
lead_paragraph: Some AT&T Wireless customers have voted an emphatic no on a promotion for “American Idol” that popped up on their phones this week.

headline.main: A Text Arrives. Oh, It’s Just an ‘Idol’ Ad.
headline.print_headline: A Text Arrives. Oh, It’s Just an ‘Idol’ Ad.
